title: Tony Blair: Hussein Had to Go, but I Regret the WMD Intelligence Mistakes of Iraq
text: Tony Blair Acknowledged 2003 Iraq Invasion Played Role in ISIS Rise 00:53 Former British Prime Minister Tony Blair acknowledged the 2003 invasion of Iraq played a part in the rise of the Islamic State militant group, and apologized for some mistakes in planning the war, in an interview broadcast on Sunday. Asked whether the offensive was the principal cause of the rise of...
